info.name: API - Reference Collection
info.description: The Onetime Secret API allows you to securely share secrets. This API provides endpoints to create, retrieve, and manage secrets. You can use this API to generate a secret URL that can be shared with others, ensuring that the secret is only accessible once. The API supports various operations such as creating a new secret, retrieving a secret, and deleting a secret. It is designed to be simple and secure, making it easy to integrate into your applications.

urlencoded.description: (Required) The secret value to be stored

request.description: Generates a password and returns a link that can be viewed only once. This is the v2 API version od the /v1/share endpoint. TTL is limited to 7 days (anonymous), 14 days (basic free plan), and 30 days (premium plan).

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: basic

request.description: Creates an encrypted secret and returns a link that can be viewed only once. This is the v2 API version od the /v1/share endpoint. TTL is limited to 7 days (anonymous), 14 days (basic free plan), and 30 days (premium plan).

urlencoded.description:
Time-to-live in seconds. Maximum varies by authentication:
* Anonymous: 604800 (7 days)
* Basic free plan: 1209600 (14 days)
* Premium plan: 2592000 (30 days)
Optional password protection. Must be 8-64 characters
Email address of intended recipient. Triggers notification when specified

request.description: Generates a random password and returns a link that can be viewed only once. TTL is limited to 7 days (anonymous), 14 days (basic free plan), and 30 days (identity plan).

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: basic
